content:
Hello! I have installed Zlip 5.7 on the server.
To register users, I use zproject.backends.EmailAuthBackend and zproject.backends.ZulipLDAPAuthBackend. If I enable "LDAP_DEACTIVATE_NON_MATCHING_USERS = True" then the users added via the zproject.backends.EmailAuthBackend will be disabled. How can I fix this without disabling the LDAP_DEACTIVATE_NON_MATCHING_USERS parameter?
This topic was moved here from #issues > LDAP Deactivate non matching users by Alya Abbott.
